Topic.Title: Revenge of the Shadow Masters (Beta Testers Wanted)

Posts.EditableText: Hey guys, as some of you may know, Slackers Inc. has been working on a sequel to "The Quest to find the Dark Hills." It's title is called "Revenge of the Shadow Masters". So far only level one has been coded and we'd like people to test it before we continue and code level two. If your interested you can either comment on here, or send an e-mail to me at... E-mail: slackers_inc@live.com Thanks, Stephen
Posts.HTML:
Hey guys,

as some of you may know, Slackers Inc. has been working on a sequel to "The Quest to find the Dark Hills." It's title is called "Revenge of the Shadow Masters".
